wikipedia_page.main: David Gibson (born 31 January 1951) is a Scottish retired amateur football defender who played in the Scottish League for Queen's Park. He was capped by Scotland at amateur level.

response: *David Gibson (photographer) (born 1957), British street photographer and occasional writer on photography
*David Gibson (Canadian politician) (1804–1864), surveyor, farmer and political figure in Upper Canada
*David Gibson (British politician), Chairman of the Independent Labour Party from 1948 to 1951
*David Gibson (footballer, born 1895) (1895–1964), Scottish footballer for Kilmarnock and teams in the United States
